page.title: 14Families - Melanie
page.content: My name is Melanie Knight and I live in Back Road. I have a little brother called Matthew who is just starting school - he is three years younger than me. I have a cat called Cinders. My dad is a transport manager in Norwich. We used to live in Claxton. Both my Grannies and Grandads live in Wenhaston. Grandad Knight built the Village Hall and the garage. He likes bowling. Grandad Stammers works at a frozen food factory in Lowestoft. I read a lot, especially Enid Blyton, but I like other books as well. We had a holiday in Yorkshire and I made a scrap book about it. We camped in a tent, but we got flooded out and had to sleep in a caravanette. I am a Brownie, I go horse riding and to gymn club. In school I like swimming and poetry best, but I like the other things too.
